joinNowPage.TermsAndConditions.iHaveRead: I have read and accepted the Terms & Conditions.
joinNowPage.body.paragraph1: MyACUVUE® Members enjoy more every time you purchase ACUVUE® contact lenses. Collect points, redeem rewards, access exclusive offers.
updatePhoneNumberPage.otpVerification.co: If you do not receive an OTP, connect with us via Line@acuvue
validation.member.couponCode.depleted: This coupon code has been fully redeemed.
validation.member.couponCode.redeemed: It looks like you've already redeemed this coupon code.
aboutPointsPage.pointsDescription.body: “MyACUVUE™ Point” is a point collection privilege given to ACUVUE® Consumer who purchase on ACUVUE® products or take actions set by ACUVUE®.​
aboutPointsPage.pointsDescription.point2: Simply make a purchase on ACUVUE® contact lenses at your optical store or ACUVUE® TO HOME to collect MyACUVUE™ points.
pointsTermsandCondition.info: Johnson & Johnson collects your personal information to include you in our Loyalty Membership Program, and to create relevant experiences and offers for you. If you do not provide this information we cannot include you in the program. Your personal information may be processed and stored outside your country of residence and further may be shared with third party providers who assist with managing this program. Further information on how we handle your personal data is contained in our Privacy Policy
rewardsPage.couponDetails.eligibleForSto: Valid for using at your optical store
rewardsPage.lifestyleCouponErrorModal.er: Sorry, this reward is only for Platinum members.
rewardsPage.lifestyleCouponErrorModal.re: Accumulate ${points} points by ${date} to be a Platinum member
error.insufficientCoupons: Rewards selected exceeds the remaining quota. Kindly update your cart
checkout.success: Check out your E-coupon Rewards sent via Line @acuvue
membershipPage.platinumView.giftDescript: Welcome you with an exclusive gift.
membershipPage.platinumView.platinumBirt: Enjoy unlimited 3X MyACUVUE™ Points for every purchase on ACUVUE® contact lenses on your birth month.
membershipPage.memberView.memberBirthday: Enjoy unlimited 2X MyACUVUE™ Points for every purchase on ACUVUE® contact lenses on your birth month

dashboardPage.opticalStore.successDialog: Your selected Optical Practice is now your preferred practice. Make a purchase today to start collecting points!
dashboardPage.invitation.appExclusiveOff: Receive exclusive offers directly in the app
dashboardPage.invitation.contactLensesBo: Get the most from your contact lenses by accessing tips and tricks in Eye Health Centre.
emailVerification.body.paragraph2: Simply tap on the link provided in the email to verify your email. Your email is your user login.
emailVerification.body.paragraph3: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam/ junk folder. If you did not receive,  contact MyACUVUE® Member Support at 0800 450 383, Mon-Sat, 12am - 8pm NZT or email myacuvue@acuvue.co.nz.

profilePage.registrationSuccessDialogBod: Welcome to MyACUVUE®! Explore the benefits of membership.

Start collecting points today with your first ACUVUE® contact lens purchase from a participating Optical Store. Use your points in the Rewards Store. Receive exclusive offers only available to members.
